# Minesweeper

[Try it here!](https://fuzetsu.github.io/minesweeper/)

Simple little minesweeper game built using:

- View: [superfine](https://github.com/jorgebucaran/superfine)
- State Management: [the meiosis pattern](https://meiosis.js.org) implemented using [mithril/stream](https://github.com/MithrilJS/mithril.js/tree/next/stream) and [patchinko](https://github.com/barneycarroll/patchinko)
- Styling: [bss](https://github.com/porsager/bss)
